mapper.sql: SELECT c.id, c.uid, c.unique_no, c.external_no, c.comm_name, c.comm_amt, c.send_amt, c.user_info, c.if_refund, c.items, c.product_list, c.description, c.clearing_time, c.status, c.remark, c.create_time, u.account, u.nickname, t.name FROM eb_fund_clearing AS c LEFT JOIN eb_user AS u ON c.uid = u.id LEFT JOIN eb_team_user as tu ON c.uid = tu.uid LEFT JOIN eb_team as t on tu.tid = t.id

SELECT c.id, c.uid, c.unique_no, c.external_no, c.comm_name, c.comm_amt, c.send_amt, c.description, c.clearing_time, c.status, c.if_refund, c.remark, c.create_time, u.account, u.nickname, t.name, u.nickname, asentity.real_name, asentity.id_card_no, card.phone, card.bank_name, card.bank_card_no FROM eb_fund_clearing AS c LEFT JOIN eb_user AS u ON c.uid = u.id LEFT JOIN eb_team_user as tu ON c.uid = tu.uid LEFT JOIN eb_team as t on tu.tid = t.id LEFT JOIN eb_channel_identity AS asentity on asentity.uid = c.uid and asentity.channel=#{channelName} left join eb_channel_card as card on card.uid = c.uid and card.channel=#{channelName}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(f.send_amt),0) FROM eb_fund_clearing AS f WHERE f.`uid`=${uid} AND f.status NOT IN ('已退款','已取消','已拦截')
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(f.send_amt),0) FROM eb_fund_clearing AS f WHERE f.`uid`=${uid} AND f.status NOT IN ('已退款','已取消','已拦截') AND DATE_FORMAT(f.`create_Time`, '%Y-%m')=#{month}
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(f.send_amt),0) FROM eb_fund_clearing AS f WHERE f.`uid`=${uid} AND f.status ='已出款' AND DATE_FORMAT(f.`create_Time`, '%Y-%m')=#{month}
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(f.send_amt),0) FROM eb_fund_clearing AS f WHERE f.`uid`=${uid} AND f.status NOT IN ('已退款','已取消','已拦截') AND DATE_FORMAT(f.`create_Time`, '%Y-%m-%d')=#{day}

SELECT '获的收益' AS title , DATE_FORMAT(f.`create_Time`, '%Y-%m-%d') as create_Time,SUM(f.`send_amt`) AS total FROM eb_fund_clearing AS f WHERE DATE_FORMAT(f.`create_Time`, '%Y-%m')=#{month} AND uid=${uid} AND f.`status` NOT IN ('已退款','已取消','已拦截') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(f.`create_Time`, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(f.`create_Time`, '%Y-%m-%d') DESC
